uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.serialiser

Class AvroSerialiser<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.data.service.serialiser.AvroSerialiser<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - the domain object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Serialiser<O>

    public class AvroSerialiser<O>
extends Object
implements Serialiser<O>
    An AvroInputStreamSerialiser is used to serialise and deserialise Avro files. Converts an avro InputStream to/from a Stream of domain objects (Os).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
